name: ts-stream
description: Type-safe object streams with seamless support for backpressure, ending, and error handling

scripts.cover: npm run build && istanbul cover _mocha -- test/test-*.js
scripts.build: tsc -p lib/ && tsc -p test/ && tsc -p examples && dts-generator --name ts-stream --baseDir lib --out ts-stream.d.ts lib/index.ts --main ts-stream/index --es6 --es6default --extern ./node_modules/ts-promise/dist/ts-promise.d.ts

author: Martin Poelstra <martin@beryllium.net>
